tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Toughest time for the  parents comes when their child falls sick.But if they know a doctor who is not only qualified and experienced but also approachable, half the tension is eased.
Dr.Yogesh P Mehta has been my son's pediatrician ever since we moved to Mumbai.He has the following qualities that makes him an excellent doctor -
1. He is gentle and polite , gives us time to explain the health issue and answers to all our illness related queries without a rush.
2. He is easily approachable and it is easy to book a suitable appointment slot.
3. He does not readily prescribe medicines/antibiotics for simple issues. 
4. He is just a call away as he shares
 his cellphone number in case of an urgency.
  He encourages parents to update him with their 
 kids' recovery ,especially in times of fever.
5. MY personal experience with Dr.Mehta 
   lately :
My son ,now 11 had dengue on Oct 4, for which I approached Dr.Mehta on the first day of fever.He not only diagnosed the disease early on but suggested a special diet chart for him that kept my son's fluid intake optimum and spared us from the pain of hospitalisation .
Since my son was weak ,I could share my son's recovery process with him over the phone ,without visiting him every day, as he had shared his mobile number with us.
I have great faith in Dr.Yogesh P Mehta and would recommend all parents to consult him for their kids' health issues. It will make the tough times during their kids' illness sail smooth and hassle free.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Paediatric care,Paediatric & Family Counselling,Consultation provided for newborns ,Pediatric Vaccinations,
review:
When it comes to our own child treatments that too for a new born, however good a doctor is, all what that's required for parents is that 
1.availability of the doctor round the clock, (I have never seen a doctor giving mob number for contacting because always all doctors say call the hospital and leave a message but this is the only doctor I know who gives mob number to parents, he also ensures that he calls back in critical attention required times to understand any difficulties etc., and more over he is never in hurry to cut the call without offering solution at that critical time may be u r at home in middle of that dark night going through a tough time.... very good Mr Mehta is..... )
2.listen to parents to understand the core issues of child and then provide solution post diagnosis. 
3. Doctor with smile face whatever their personal problems are in their mind.
4.friendliness to parents and children *** ** ****** **** ********* without experimenting on child by offering many medicines on trial basis.
6.instant appointment giving and no waiting... this makes me very comfortable as I am very busy in my schedule ... Dr Mehta is always conveniently accommodates whenever called for appointment with very short notice.

All the above qualities are perfectly matching with Dr Yogesh Mehta from Dr. L H Hiranandani Hospital powai...
Any parents who wants the doctor with above qualities will not say no to this doctor....  I truly respect Dr Mehta.... so far he is not doctor to my 2nd son since he was born but also for my 1st son who is 8 years old and he has become our family doctor now.....  
Dr Mehta exceptional quality is that he is well aware of All the issues of new born child or matured  children during diagnosis time in advance so he comes to treatment solution without experimenting...
I strongly recommend Dr Yogesh Mehta to parents for their new born or for delivery or for children of any age and even for parents..... tell.me ,who does not want "all facility under single umbrella" which Dr Mehta perfectly offers....
Don't hesitate to write to me or call me to kmow more about Dr Mehta who is such a great experienced doctor who are rarely seen....  most importantly the money comes secondary to him... In fact I have been after him to pay for  fees many a times  at the fee counter to remind him..... so gentle and warm and smily faced rare doctor...  look at the doctor with smile which throws away 50% patients disease because as a parent u get that confidence and comfortness  to talk to him.   
I finish this with this shirt note as nothing is adequate to describe him  in few lines......
Parents.... Please try him out this outstanding doctor who stands out from the crowd in providing good treatment and he is tech savvy and mobile and WhatsApp friendly..... what more u want in these Internet of things (IOT) days....
Good day..... God bless.
-by ugendran chettiar and sumalatha chettiar.
Goregaon. Mumbai 
Consulting enginner,and  chairman of chettiar group of companies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I wanted to express my heartfelt gratitude for the outstanding care you have provided to my son. Your approach to pediatric care is truly commendable, and I wanted to take a moment to acknowledge your efforts.Your ability to explain medical processes in a clear and understandable manner has been invaluable to us. It's evident that you possess a remarkable talent for breaking down complex medical concepts into simpler terms, which greatly eases our concerns as parents.Moreover, your dedication to follow up on our baby's health post-consultation reassures us that you genuinely care about his ongoing health and recovery. Furthermore, I appreciate your willingness to listen and understand our concerns thoroughly before suggesting medical solutions. Your patient-centered approach makes us feel heard and respected, and it's evident that you take a holistic view of our son's well-being.Your exceptional qualities as a pediatrician have made a significant positive impact on our family, and we are grateful to have you as our son's healthcare provider. Your dedication, empathy, and expertise are truly admirable and deserving of recognition.Thank you once again for your unwavering commitment to ensuring the best possible care for our child.

tags: None
review: Dr. Yogesh Mehta is incredible. It was my daughter's first appointment, and he not only took great care of her health but also was delightful to speak with. It's rare to find a doctor who combines such personal touches and genuine care for patients with outstanding medical expertise. I highly recommend him!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Childhood Infections,Pediatric Vaccinations,Paediatric care,Nutrition in Children,
review:
We have been consulting Dr. Mehta from the first day of my daughter's birth. We were as nervous and anxious as any of the first time parents are, however, he immediately put us at ease and gave us precise instructions as to how to go about nursing the baby. From then till now (my daughter is almost 3.5 years), he has been the Pediatrician to my child. The best part about the doctor is that he is available on phone whenever you need him- that in itself allays your fears (just in case an emergency arises). Also, he makes the child feel comfortable and makes Pediatrician visit a pleasant experience for them. 
We had one such situation when my daughter was just five days old and her weight was reducing. She wasn't much active and so the doctor asked us to get her admitted if she doesn't show much activity. We did so, and immediately after getting her to the hospital she was her normal self within a couple of hours. Dr. Mehta kept her under observation for a day ( to ensure that the child is not dehydrating) and discharged her post that as it was just a case of normal weight loss. We were happy the way the doctor handled it and would recommend him to the parents of a newborn and parents who are in search of a good Pediatrician for their growing children.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Mehta is extremely diligent in his diagnosis, and always ensures that the disease is suitably diagnosed before a medication/prescription is given. This might seem simple but anyone with small children know that this is extremely tricky. Dr. Mehta would always be in touch with you for first 24 hours after the first visit and take thorough observations to finalize his diagnosis and then prescribe medications. This is rare in today's age when the default way is to start immediate antibiotics. Extremely trustworthy and reliable, a 10 minute visit would relieve a parent of several doubts and that's actually half the medicine. Recommend Dr. Mehta for small children, especially if your approach is to go with only essential medications/antibiotics. He is the one who recommended nutritional ways to help us develop our child's immunity. Basis his nutrition advice, we could ensure a huge benefit in terms of frequency of seasonal infections for our toddler. 

His patience and polite demeanor is a cherry on the ice for a learned and experienced practitioner. 

In summary, an experienced professional whom you can trust like a family member.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I still remember when I delivered in the month of March, Dr. Yogesh Mehta was assigned by the hospital to check my newly born baby. Frankly I didn't know anything about Dr Mehta, but now I can say that when you have Dr. Yogesh Mehta as your pediatrician than you are rest assured that you have right doctor for your kid who is always a phone call away. You want to feel comfortable asking questions, discussing diagnoses and treatments, and partnering with your Child's  pediatrician in your child’s care. There is a lot to learn about your child’s health and being able to understand what your doctor explains to you is an important part of child's health. Dr. Yogesh Mehta is a very good communicator, looks you in the eye, explains information in layman’s terms, answers your questions, is patient with you and your child, and respects you as the child’s parent. ** ***** **** **** **** ***** **** *** **** ********* *** **** **** ***** **** ******* **** he takes timely progress by calling you personally and will give you further advise which is very rare quality in any doctor (because of their busy schedule). I will definitely recommend Dr. Yogesh Mehta to every mother for their kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Yogesh Mehta is a great friendly and fatherly Doctor who is very affectionate while talking to his patients who might be anxious and stressed.
He responds very promptly and his treatment and medication is always effective and brings immediate relief.
He follows up to make sure whether his patient has recovered or not.
Just by talking to him during consultation brings down anxiety and stress as already mentioned above.
God bless you Sir. Love and Regards Always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We went here for our daughter. It was a weekend and we couldn't find any pediatrician. I found Dr. Mehta on Google. He deserves all the credits that there is. He followed up with us consistently and ensured our daughter gets well soon.

God Bless you doctor 🙏🙏🙏🙏

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My daughter fell ill on Sunday and her usual pediatrician is not available on Sundays. And we were finding it difficult to find a good doctor on Sunday. That’s when we came across Dr. Mehta. Not just the treatment given to my 4.5 years daughter was good but also doctor’s friendliness and attitude towards childcare was outstanding. He is the first doctor who I have come across that mentioned he is available 24/7 and that I could call him or message anytime if any concerns with my child health. This fact in itself is very comforting for any parent. He also took my number and he personally checked with me about my daughter’s health after two days. He is really good and is very genuine.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Mehta is very friendly in nature and understands root cause of issues by asking relevant questions and explains medication in detail. His prescription are very effective to treat the problem. Dr kindly supported us in follow ups and helped us to come out of anxiety.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had a great experience consulting with Dr Yogesh. He has been really patient in listening to all our issues and has been constantly in touch with us to make sure our daughter is treated in the best possible manner. He goes the extra mile to make sure the problem gets resolved thoroughly and not just superficially by suggesting good habits and extra medicines needed for the long term.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am so thankful that I have got such a helpful doctor because, in treating my child; he showed more concern than us by obtaining every day’s update through call or video call and update the prescription based on health update he received from us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is really very polite and friendly. He listens carefully to the patient and then explain the condition. He also gave me his number and told me to give updates about my kids health and accordingly he suggested what to do next. He takes care of his patients and stays in contact untill the patient recovers. you can consult him for your kid.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Yogesh has been our go to person for our daughter since a long time now. 

One of the instances, where our daughter suffered from ear pain all of sudden and we called him for consultation, he not only gave the right treatment but also ensured to check if she was fine - can you thank him any more for that. His accurate diagnosis, personal touch and availability (even at the odd hours) have been so much relief for us that we now feel so confident with him.

He not only treated our daughter but also gave her the right medicines to build her inner strength that she doesn't fell ill so frequently now. 

We surely recommend his services for your children as you will be in very safe hands.

In the end - Thank You so much Dr. Yogesh for being our Pediatrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Mehta has been a thorough professional and treats his child patients as their own.We have been consulting him since last two years and he has been so comforting and always available no matter what the time.He always attends to all our queries and problems till the time we are mentally comfortable and also himself makes a follow up call to see all is well.He ensures that medicines are given only if required.He has always been aavailable literally early mornings as well as late nights.He is now a family to us and we are so happy and secured to have him around.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Mehta is my one-year-old son's paediatrician. He is a very experienced and good doctor. The best thing about him is that you can contact him at any time if urgent and get quick resolution for your kid's health issues. He solves most of my queries over phone which makes things easier for working people like us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted the doctor online when my baby was crying alot due to reflux. It was too difficult to understand the situation.

I have gone through reviews and found Dr Yogesh Mehta. We are really blessed to find him. The way he consoles and motivates parents.

He listened all the issues and cross checked all the queries. After that he suggested the medicines.

The next day he called up to enquire about the status. Also, he asked us to feel free to contact him at anytime.

We met an excellent doctor and looking forward to consult him in future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted the doctor online when my son got a viral infection. I was frantically searching for paediatrician on a Sunday and thankfully Dr Mehta was available. He consulted through video call and prescribed medicines. Most importantly he gave a briefing about what to expect in the coming days. He even adjusted the antibiotic as per our request as my son did not like the taste of the liquid. The next day Dr called up to enquire about the status and was very  comforting. *** ********* *** **** ********* *** *** fever started coming down the same day.  We were able to brief him about his health everyday for a week till he completely recovered. Dr. Mehta is an excellent choice. I am looking forward to consult him on boosting the immunity of my kid in the future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** **** ****** ***** He was my pediatrician when I was a baby and now he is my baby's pediatrician he is like family to us! We trust him completely with his guidance and treatment. He is always there for us ...how many people can you say something like this in life. RIght from the delivery room till now he has stood by us in our bad times, even when we were scared at 11 in d night when my 6 months old baby fell off the bed he was there for us. Words fall short to thank you Sir. You are and you always will be our most loved and favourite doctor and a true friend. We respect you and love you for your spirit your passion and advise. Many thanks for being in our life God bless you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: When our daughter Arianna was born we consulted another paediatrician, but we were not happy with the doctor. Then a friend suggested us to visit Dr Yogesh Mehta and since then I am worry free about the health of our daughter. Once my daughter feel ill at the age of 8 months, she  was running a high fever. It was a Sunday, I panickly called Dr Mehta and he immediately asked us to visit the hospital. Even on a Sunday at 5 in in the evening he cancelled his personal appointment of a family function and attended to our daughter till 9 pm. Since then I have very high regards for him.Dr Mehta is very friendly and will listen to us patiently. There have been times when I have called him at 11 in the night for consultation and he has been kind enough to listen to us and provide solution. Our daughter is now 2.2 years old and I will continue to consult Dr Mehta for my daughter's health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pediatric Vaccinations,All Pediatric Problems ,Consultation provided for newborns ,Child health disorder ,
review: Dr. Mehta has been a savior many a times. He is our go to doctor for any and every reason when it comes to our Daughter. Dr. Mehta came highly recommended by our friends and he has totally lived up to that reputation. He is very friendly, patient and accommodating, taking calls even at night for emergency situations. Having a trusted doctor who understands the panic of a new parent, is able to patiently listen and then explain the issue, is a rarity these days. Dr Mehta is one of those doctors who puts the faith back in Doctors. Thank you so much Dr Mehta!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are new in the city just after the transition my daughter got infection . Being first time parent we were very very concern luckily we found Dr Yogesh on Practo rite from the time we spoke he gave us a lot of assurance and insights for reference . He is available around the clock and takes baby’s update on regular interval No other doctor does it . Really if they say the doctors are god alike it surely apply to Dr Yogesh . We are thankful to him for taking care of our baby .. you are trust him blindly !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have been seeing Dr. Mehta for our 1.5 year old son since almost right after he was born. Dr. Mehta is very experienced and has a calm and patient demeanor which is especially reassuring for first time parents. He spends a lot of time explaining the issue and he also tells you clearly about the medicines to be taken and precautions that need to be taken at home. He is also always available on the phone for follow up consultations or for emergencies. The time and care that he devotes to each patient (and assuaging their parents fears!) is truly remarkable. We cannot thank him enough for his help over the past year and a half. Strongly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Being a first time mother Dr.Mehta has been extremely helpful in dealing with my endlees questions and anxiety. He is a patient listener and explains the problem and solution to our fullest satisfaction. He is easily approachable and responds to calls . I was really happy when he called me the next day after my sons mounting fever n cold to check on status and revise medicines . *** ********* *** **** ** *** ********** ********* . I could not have asked for a better guide during this new journey . He is always smiling and encourages you if he feels u are unhappy or feeling low on hearing some new development or illness about your child .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Mehta has been my pediatrician and is now my baby's. In our over 20 years of experience with him, he has guided us perfectly through everything from common infections to serious ailments. Despite his busy schedule he always makes it a point to follow up with his patients and is reachable at odd hours too. He has always provided us with precise diagnoses and ideal treatment plan. He is extremely ************* *** professional. I would highly recommend Dr. Mehta as he is an outstanding pediatrician with superlative understanding of child healthcare.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mehta has been our family physician since I was a child and now he's my son's paediatrician. Accurate diagnosis and perfect treatment plan is what you can expect from this extremely professional and experienced doctor. In our 20 years of experience, there hasn't been a single instance of misdiagnosis be it run of the mill infections to serious illnesses. You can blindly trust his astute judgement without resorting to any second opinions including the one on the internet! Despite his extremely busy schedule, he always makes time for his patients and follows up with you until the illness is resolved. I highly recommend Dr.Mehta as he is an excellent paediatrician with unmatched credentials and experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Since birth of our son Shlok, we are consulting Dr Yogesh Mehta, for last 5 years. We have been to three different countries but never came across such a wonderful doctor as well as a friendly human being. He always give a genuine advice and avoide unnecessary medications. As a parent, one thing I like about Dr Mehta, is that he is always available for advice. Even when we called him from outside India, still he was very attentive to our call and gave proper advice. I am thankful to Dr Yogesh Mehta, for his health advice to my son and will always prefer going to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Dr. Yogesh Mehta with his experience and the faith with which parents like us approach him, is an testimony of he being an asset to

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We highly recommend Dr Mehta. He is.
- calm and addresses patient/guardian concerns before jumping in to medical examination

- Accessible on phone at all times and in person. Any time we need a clarification, he is a call away. Returns call/ text if he is busy

- doesn't go overboard with medication - never prescribes unnecessary medication and gives time for recovery. 

- patient listener - addresses our concerns well till we are satisfied. Never hurries us during consultations. 

- proactively follows up - we were quite touched when he followed up with us when our younger daughter was going through severe weight loss post birth.

- ****** *** ****** ****** ** ** **** *** ********* ********* **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Yogesh Mehta is truly a veteran and very much experienced doctor in his field. We’ve been consulting him from the day our daughter born. Since then till now, in any emergency or less critical health condition of our daughter, he always served a brilliant treatment. Many of my friends/colleagues are benefitted by his treatment and everyone praised him for his friendly and caring nature.  I always like his smiling face J …that gives us a relief first from the tensed situations we went through.  I like his approach for the diagnosis and treatment – it’s very clean, clear and always well explained to us so that we can understand it clearly. Finally, the best part is his dedications – no matter what or how much busy he is I never seen him forget to call us back when some health concern there.I strongly recommend Dr Mehta to everyone, he never disappointed anyone.

review: We are very impressed with the energy level of Dr.Mehta. We have depended on Dr.Mehta for health related issues of our daughter since last 2.5 i.e right from her birth and are fully satisfied. review: My wife recently delivered a baby girl at Hiranandani hoapital. Dr. Yogesh Mehta was her Paediatrician. I had a really good experience with the doctor. I recommend him to all the other parents I know. Because I know I'll never be able to find a better doctor than him.

review: We have been seeing Dr. Yogesh P Mehta from the past 6 years since the time our Loving child was born at the Hiranandani Hospital in Powai. He is a very good and experienced doctor. Seeing the doctor is always a peace of mind.
